54 enum class BodyType {STATIC, KINEMATIC, DYNAMIC};
55 
56 // Class RigidBodyComponents
61 class RigidBodyComponents : public Components {
62 
63  private:
64 
65  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
66 
68  Entity* mBodiesEntities;
69 
71  RigidBody** mRigidBodies;
72 
74  bool* mIsAllowedToSleep;
75 
77  bool* mIsSleeping;
78 
80  decimal* mSleepTimes;
81 
83  BodyType* mBodyTypes;
84 
86  Vector3* mLinearVelocities;
87 
89  Vector3* mAngularVelocities;
90 
92  Vector3* mExternalForces;
93 
95  Vector3* mExternalTorques;
96 
98  decimal* mLinearDampings;
99 
101  decimal* mAngularDampings;
102 
104  decimal* mMasses;
105 
107  decimal* mInverseMasses;
108 
110  Vector3* mLocalInertiaTensors;
111 
113  Vector3* mInverseInertiaTensorsLocal;
114 
116  Matrix3x3* mInverseInertiaTensorsWorld;
117 
119  Vector3* mConstrainedLinearVelocities;
120 
122  Vector3* mConstrainedAngularVelocities;
123 
125  Vector3* mSplitLinearVelocities;
126 
128  Vector3* mSplitAngularVelocities;
129 
131  Vector3* mConstrainedPositions;
132 
134  Quaternion* mConstrainedOrientations;
135 
137  Vector3* mCentersOfMassLocal;
138 
140  Vector3* mCentersOfMassWorld;
141 
143  bool* mIsGravityEnabled;
144 
146  bool* mIsAlreadyInIsland;
147 
149  Array<Entity>* mJoints;
150 
152  Array<uint>* mContactPairs;
153 
155  Vector3* mLinearLockAxisFactors;
156 
158  Vector3* mAngularLockAxisFactors;
159 
160  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
161 
163  virtual void allocate(uint32 nbComponentsToAllocate) override;
164 
166  virtual void destroyComponent(uint32 index) override;
167 
169  virtual void moveComponentToIndex(uint32 srcIndex, uint32 destIndex) override;
170 
172  virtual void swapComponents(uint32 index1, uint32 index2) override;
173 
174  public:
175 
177  struct RigidBodyComponent {
178 
179  RigidBody* body;
180  BodyType bodyType;
181  const Vector3& worldPosition;
182 
184  RigidBodyComponent(RigidBody* body, BodyType bodyType, const Vector3& worldPosition)
185  : body(body), bodyType(bodyType), worldPosition(worldPosition) {
186 
187  }
188  };
189 
190  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
191 
193  RigidBodyComponents(MemoryAllocator& allocator);
194 
196  virtual ~RigidBodyComponents() override = default;
197 
199  void addComponent(Entity bodyEntity, bool isSleeping, const RigidBodyComponent& component);
200 
202  RigidBody* getRigidBody(Entity bodyEntity);

293

305

308 
310  const Vector3& getCenterOfMassLocal(Entity bodyEntity);
311 
313  const Vector3& getCenterOfMassWorld(Entity bodyEntity);
314 
316  bool getIsGravityEnabled(Entity bodyEntity) const;
317 
319  bool getIsAlreadyInIsland(Entity bodyEntity) const;
320 
322  const Vector3& getLinearLockAxisFactor(Entity bodyEntity) const;
323 
325  const Vector3& getAngularLockAxisFactor(Entity bodyEntity) const;

329 
331  void setConstrainedAngularVelocity(Entity bodyEntity, const Vector3& constrainedAngularVelocity);

334  void setSplitLinearVelocity(Entity bodyEntity, const Vector3& splitLinearVelocity);
335 
337  void setSplitAngularVelocity(Entity bodyEntity, const Vector3& splitAngularVelocity);
338 
340  void setConstrainedPosition(Entity bodyEntity, const Vector3& constrainedPosition);
341 
343  void setConstrainedOrientation(Entity bodyEntity, const Quaternion& constrainedOrientation);
344 
346  void setCenterOfMassLocal(Entity bodyEntity, const Vector3& centerOfMassLocal);
347 
349  void setCenterOfMassWorld(Entity bodyEntity, const Vector3& centerOfMassWorld);
350 
352  void setIsGravityEnabled(Entity bodyEntity, bool isGravityEnabled);
353 
355  void setIsAlreadyInIsland(Entity bodyEntity, bool isAlreadyInIsland);
356 
358  void setLinearLockAxisFactor(Entity bodyEntity, const Vector3& linearLockAxisFactor);
359 
361  void setAngularLockAxisFactor(Entity bodyEntity, const Vector3& rotationTranslationFactor);
362 
364  const Array<Entity>& getJoints(Entity bodyEntity) const;
365 
367  void addJointToBody(Entity bodyEntity, Entity jointEntity);
368 
370  void removeJointFromBody(Entity bodyEntity, Entity jointEntity);
371 
373  void addContacPair(Entity bodyEntity, uint32 contactPairIndex);
374 
375  // -------------------- Friendship -------------------- //
376 
377  friend class PhysicsWorld;
378  friend class ContactSolverSystem;
379  friend class CollisionDetectionSystem;
380  friend class SolveBallAndSocketJointSystem;
381  friend class SolveFixedJointSystem;
382  friend class SolveHingeJointSystem;
383  friend class SolveSliderJointSystem;
384  friend class DynamicsSystem;
385  friend class BallAndSocketJoint;
386  friend class FixedJoint;
387  friend class HingeJoint;
388  friend class SliderJoint;
389 };
390 
391 // Return a pointer to a body rigid
392 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE RigidBody* RigidBodyComponents::getRigidBody(Entity bodyEntity) {
393 
394  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
395 
396  return mRigidBodies[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]];
397 }
398 
399 // Return true if the body is allowed to sleep
400 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE bool RigidBodyComponents::getIsAllowedToSleep(Entity bodyEntity) const {
401 
402  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
403 
404  return mIsAllowedToSleep[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]];
405 }
406 
407 // Set the value to know if the body is allowed to sleep
408 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void RigidBodyComponents::setIsAllowedToSleep(Entity bodyEntity, bool isAllowedToSleep) const {
409 
410  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
411 
412  mIsAllowedToSleep[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]] = isAllowedToSleep;
413 }
414 
415 // Return true if the body is sleeping
416 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE bool RigidBodyComponents::getIsSleeping(Entity bodyEntity) const {
417 
418  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
419 
420  return mIsSleeping[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]];
421 }
422 
423 // Set the value to know if the body is sleeping
424 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void RigidBodyComponents::setIsSleeping(Entity bodyEntity, bool isSleeping) const {
425 
426  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
427 
428  mIsSleeping[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]] = isSleeping;
429 }
430 
431 // Return the sleep time
432 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal RigidBodyComponents::getSleepTime(Entity bodyEntity) const {
433 
434  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
435 
436  return mSleepTimes[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]];
437 }
438 
439 // Set the sleep time
440 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void RigidBodyComponents::setSleepTime(Entity bodyEntity, decimal sleepTime) const {
441 
442  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
443 
444  mSleepTimes[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]] = sleepTime;
445 }
446 
447 // Return the body type of a body
448 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE BodyType RigidBodyComponents::getBodyType(Entity bodyEntity) {
449 
450  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
451 
452  return mBodyTypes[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]];
453 }
454 
455 // Set the body type of a body
456 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void RigidBodyComponents::setBodyType(Entity bodyEntity, BodyType bodyType) {
457 
458  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
459 
460  mBodyTypes[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]] = bodyType;
461 }
462 
463 // Return the linear velocity of an entity
464 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const Vector3& RigidBodyComponents::getLinearVelocity(Entity bodyEntity) const {
465 
466  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
467 
468  return mLinearVelocities[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]];
469 }
470 
471 // Return the angular velocity of an entity
472 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const Vector3& RigidBodyComponents::getAngularVelocity(Entity bodyEntity) const {
473 
474  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
475 
476  return mAngularVelocities[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]];
477 }
478 
479 // Set the linear velocity of an entity
480 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void RigidBodyComponents::setLinearVelocity(Entity bodyEntity, const Vector3& linearVelocity) {
481 
482  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
483 
484  mLinearVelocities[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]] = linearVelocity;
485 }
486 
487 // Set the angular velocity of an entity
488 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void RigidBodyComponents::setAngularVelocity(Entity bodyEntity, const Vector3& angularVelocity) {
489 
490  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
491 
492  mAngularVelocities[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]] = angularVelocity;
493 }

495 // Return the external force of an entity

497 
498  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
499 
500  return mExternalForces[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]];
501 }
502 
503 // Return the external torque of an entity

505 
506  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
507 
508  return mExternalTorques[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]];
509 }
510

515 
516  return mLinearDampings[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]];
517 }

527 // Return the mass of an entity
528 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal RigidBodyComponents::getMass(Entity bodyEntity) const {
529 
530  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
531 
532  return mMasses[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]];
533 }
534 
535 // Return the inverse mass of an entity
536 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal RigidBodyComponents::getMassInverse(Entity bodyEntity) const {
537 
538  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
539 
540  return mInverseMasses[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]];
541 }
542

545

547 
548  return mInverseInertiaTensorsLocal[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]];
549 }

790 }
791 
792 // Set the value to know if the gravity is enabled for this entity
793 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void RigidBodyComponents::setIsGravityEnabled(Entity bodyEntity, bool isGravityEnabled) {
794 
795  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
796 
797  mIsGravityEnabled[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]] = isGravityEnabled;
798 }
799 
800 // Set the value to know if the entity is already in an island
801 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void RigidBodyComponents::setIsAlreadyInIsland(Entity bodyEntity, bool isAlreadyInIsland) {
802 
803  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
804  mIsAlreadyInIsland[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]] = isAlreadyInIsland;
805 }
806 
807 // Set the linear lock axis factor
808 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void RigidBodyComponents::setLinearLockAxisFactor(Entity bodyEntity, const Vector3& linearLockAxisFactor) {
809 
810  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
811  mLinearLockAxisFactors[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]] = linearLockAxisFactor;
812 }
813 
814 // Set the angular lock axis factor
815 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void RigidBodyComponents::setAngularLockAxisFactor(Entity bodyEntity, const Vector3& angularLockAxisFactor) {
816 
817  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
818  mAngularLockAxisFactors[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]] = angularLockAxisFactor;
819 }
820 
821 // Return the array of joints of a body
822 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const Array<Entity>& RigidBodyComponents::getJoints(Entity bodyEntity) const {
823 
824  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
825  return mJoints[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]];
826 }
827 
828 // Add a joint to a body component
829 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void RigidBodyComponents::addJointToBody(Entity bodyEntity, Entity jointEntity) {
830 
831  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
832  mJoints[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]].add(jointEntity);
833 }
834 
835 // Remove a joint from a body component
836 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void RigidBodyComponents::removeJointFromBody(Entity bodyEntity, Entity jointEntity) {
837 
838  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
839  mJoints[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]].remove(jointEntity);
840 }
841 
842 // A an associated contact pairs into the contact pairs array of the body
843 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void RigidBodyComponents::addContacPair(Entity bodyEntity, uint32 contactPairIndex) {
844 
845  assert(mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(bodyEntity));
846  mContactPairs[mMapEntityToComponentIndex[bodyEntity]].add(contactPairIndex);
847 }
848 
849 }
850 
851 #endif
